entry.title: 🎞️ Tetris (2023)
entry.summary: Film Details Film Tetris Directed Jon S. Baird Year 2023 My Rating ★★★ Review Tetris was an interesting story. The game is objectively one of the greatest of all time. Learning the story behind it coming to the Game Boy that I played almost 30 years ago is something I didn’t know I wanted to...

entry.title: 📖 Bobiverse Series
entry.summary: Review The Bobiverse series is a set of three four science fiction books written by author Dennis E. Taylor. This series is a blend of science, humor, and drama that takes the reader on a thrilling journey through space and time. The story begins with Bob Johansson, a software engineer who, after being cryogenically frozen, wakes up to find that he has been uploaded into a machine that allows...
